text: Veliko Tarnovo is a province in Bulgaria. The capital city is also named Veliko Tarnovo. ==Municipalities== The Veliko Tarnovo province has 10 municipalities. The following table shows the names of each municipality, the main town (in bold) or village, and the population of each as of December 2009. Municipality Pop. Town/Village Pop. Bulgarian National Statistical Institute - Bulgarian towns in 2009 „pop-stat.mashke.org“ Elena 10,407 Elena 5,665 Gorna Oryahovitsa 48,695 Gorna Oryahovitsa 32,436 Lyaskovets 13,677 Lyaskovets 8,277 Pavlikeni 26,342 Pavlikeni 11,151 Polski Trambesh 15,309 Polski Trambesh 4,546 Strazhitsa 14,742 Strazhitsa 5,170 Suhindol 3,046 Suhindol 2,146 Svishtov 49,817 Svishtov 35,923 Veliko Tarnovo 88,724 Veliko Tarnovo 67,099 Zlataritsa 4,636 Zlataritsa 2,558 ==References== Category:Provinces of Bulgaria
title: Veliko Tarnovo Province
